title: Bulls debuts new gravel Machete, road Alpine Hawk, killer Sonic eMTBs & more bikes!
content:
German bikemaker Bulls has a ton of new bikes coming for 2022, from an all-new carbon Machete gravel bike to a killer carbon Sonic eMTB platform with builds from all-mountain to enduro. In between, there are an all-new carbon aero road bike with endurance vibes, an alloy commuter bike with gravel adventure aspirations, and a

The post Bulls debuts new gravel Machete, road Alpine Hawk, killer Sonic eMTBs & more bikes! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
